thread.title: No kidding! Amazon's Alexa no longer tells Trump jokes - CNET
thread.title_full: No kidding! Amazon's Alexa no longer tells Trump jokes - CNET

author: Dong Ngo
title: No kidding! Amazon's Alexa no longer tells Trump jokes - CNET
text:
No kidding! Amazon's Alexa no longer tells Trump jokes No kidding! Amazon's Alexa no longer tells Trump jokes Amazon's virtual assistant says it doesn't know any jokes about President Donald Trump. CNET 
It looks like Amazon's Alexa has lost a bit of humor. 
On Sunday, a Reddit user posted that the virtual assistant would no longer tell jokes about President Donald Trump. Instead, Alexa now responds: "I don't know any Donald Trump jokes. But you can ask me for a political joke instead." 
We tested this in-house with an Amazon Dot and, indeed, no more Trump jokes. Amazon didn't immediately respond to a request for comment about the change. 
Maybe Alexa's Trump jokes just weren't funny? Or maybe Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos has patched things up with the president ? Alexa didn't provide more information on this, either. Share your voice
